Whats driving company specific tariffsMU Downgraded by 2 firms Stifel lowered MU price target to 54 from 60 citing the uncertainty caused by the trade fight including the US ban on shipping products to Huawei Shipments into China accounted for about 32 of Microns revenue and Huawei accounted for about 13 in FY18 Deutsche Bank lowered 2019 earnings per share estimate for Micron Technology to 330 from 440 and 2020 estimate to 375 from 470 on Huawei ban along with incremental memory pricing weakness
